ruling: - If you chain [[Rare Metalmorph]] to an effect like [[Snatch Steal]] that targets a monster, [[Snatch Steal]] is equipped but its effect is negated while [[Rare Metalmorph]] is active.
- If a monster targeted by [[Rare Metalmorph]] is flipped face-down, it is no longer targeted by [[Rare Metalmorph]] and [[Rare Metalmorph]] remains on the field meaninglessly.
- You can activate this card during the Damage Step.
